sentence.Network_en: He threatened to disinherit her if she refused to obey.
sentence.Network_cn: 他威胁说如果她拒绝服从就剥夺她的继承权。

sentence.Network_en: You don't mean to disinherit her, do you ?
sentence.Network_cn: 你总不愿意剥夺她的继承权 吧 ?

sentence.Network_en: John's father threatened to disinherit him if he married beneath himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰的父亲威胁约翰说,如果他同地位低的女子结婚,就要剥夺他的继承权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 冰与火之歌单词 - 豆丁网 ... dishonorable 不名誉的, 不光彩的 disinherit 剥夺...继承权 disinterest 无兴趣, 不关心.
2011年英语六级词汇大全_fang_新浪博客 ... chicanery n. 诈骗 disinherit vt. 剥求……的继承权 disorient 使……失去方向.

RelatedPhrase.word: where a testamentary successor is disinherited

disingenuouslydisingenuousness disinherit 失继承权disinheritance disintegrate 分解分裂分化瓦解破裂崩溃粉碎分.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (superseding earlier disherit): from dis- (expressing removal) + inherit in the obsolete sense 'make someone an heir'

entry.def: If you disinherit someone such as your son or daughter, you arrange that they will not become the owner of your money and property after your death, usually because they have done something that you do not approve of.

example.ex: He threatened to disinherit her if she refused to obey.
example.tran: 他威胁说如果她拒绝服从就剥夺她的继承权。

means.word_mean: 1. prevent deliberately (as by making a will) from inheriting

auth_sentence.content: It doesn't mean we should disinherit him.
auth_sentence.res_content: It doesn't mean we should disinherit him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It doesn't mean we should disinherit him.

auth_sentence.content: Earth, methinks, Will disinherit thy philosophy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Earth, methinks, Will disinherit thy philosophy.

auth_sentence.content: After you're married, it takes more lawyering to disinherit a spouse.
